```lisp
[(:action search
  :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?agent ?location)
    (not (found ?agent ?item))
  )
  :effect (and
    (found ?agent ?item)
  )
)

(:action search_for_water_source
  :parameters (?agent - person ?location - place)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?agent ?location)
    (not (found ?agent water_source))
  )
  :effect (found ?agent water_source)
)

(:action search_area
  :parameters (?agent - person ?location - place ?area - area)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?agent ?location)
    (not (found ?agent ?area))
  )
  :effect (found ?agent ?area)
)

(:action find_tinder
  :parameters (?t - tinder)
  :precondition (not (collected ?t))
  :effect (collected ?t)
)

(:action gather_kindling
  :parameters (?k - kindling)
  :precondition (not (collected ?k))
  :effect (collected ?k)
)

(:action search_for_area
  :parameters (?a - area)
  :precondition (not (searched ?a))
  :effect (searched ?a)
)

(:action find
  :parameters (?entity - collectible)
  :precondition (not (collected ?entity))
  :effect (collected ?entity)
)

(:action start
  :parameters (?actor - person ?resource - object ?location - area)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?actor)
    (collected ?resource)
    (selected ?location)
    (not (started ?actor ?resource ?location))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (started ?actor ?resource ?location)
    (fire_started ?location)
  )
)]
```
